# Varity SDK Documentation for LLMs
# Version: 1.2.3 | Last Updated: January 28, 2026
# This file is optimized for AI assistants to understand Varity SDK

## Overview
Varity is a Web3 development platform that lets developers build and deploy decentralized applications without blockchain knowledge. It provides 70-85% cost savings compared to AWS.

## Core Concepts

### Varity L3
- Arbitrum Orbit rollup optimized for app deployment
- Chain ID: 33529
- RPC: https://rpc-varity-testnet-rroe52pwjp.t.conduit.xyz
- Explorer: https://explorer-varity-testnet-rroe52pwjp.t.conduit.xyz
- Native Token: Bridged USDC (6 decimals, NOT 18)

### Smart Contracts
- TemplateMarketplace: 0x769250dac29817081f38CfBa597Ef2485F3a94e8 (70/30 revenue split)
- TemplateRegistry: 0xEbD8C516c05BD2b76b5CDd56530b3Dd9f8b3D748
- VarityAppRegistry: 0x52d4f28ebe20fad743bbef9daa61bfe3ce91eb74
- SimplifiedPaymaster: 0xeF467aef91d4e626C7e56967779069bEF22c4453
- VarityWalletFactory: 0x85AB92708CB4d921f5c2BdCCd7f2D0813a380f71

## SDK Packages

### @varity/sdk
Core SDK for authentication, storage, payments, and chain configuration.

Installation:
```bash
npm install @varity/sdk
```

Key exports:
- createVarityClient() - Initialize the SDK
- createStorageClient() - IPFS/Arweave storage
- varityL3Chain - Chain configuration

### @varity/ui-kit
React components for building Varity apps.

Installation:
```bash
npm install @varity/ui-kit
```

Key components:
- PrivyStack - Authentication provider wrapper
- PrivyLoginButton - Login/logout button
- PrivyProtectedRoute - Route protection
- SmartWalletProvider - ERC-4337 smart wallets
- BuyUSDCButton - Credit card on-ramp
- OnrampWidget - Full payment widget

### @varity/types
TypeScript type definitions.

Installation:
```bash
npm install @varity/types
```

## Quick Start Pattern

```tsx
import { PrivyStack, PrivyLoginButton } from '@varity/ui-kit';

function App() {
  return (
    <PrivyStack appId={process.env.NEXT_PUBLIC_VARITY_APP_ID}>
      <PrivyLoginButton />
      <YourApp />
    </PrivyStack>
  );
}
```

## CLI Commands

Install CLI:
```bash
pip install varitykit
```

Commands:
- varitykit doctor - Check environment setup
- varitykit init - Initialize new project
- varitykit deploy --hosting ipfs - Deploy static app
- varitykit deploy --hosting akash - Deploy dynamic app

## Authentication Methods
- Email (magic link, no password)
- Social: Google, Twitter, Discord, GitHub
- Wallet: MetaMask, WalletConnect, Coinbase Wallet

## Storage Options
- IPFS: Fast, pinned storage (default)
- Arweave: Permanent, immutable storage

## Payments
- Credit card on-ramp via thirdweb Pay
- Gasless transactions via ERC-4337
- Users never see crypto or pay gas fees

## Revenue Model
- 70% to developer
- 30% to Varity platform

## Common Patterns

### File Upload
```tsx
const storage = createStorageClient({ client });
const result = await storage.uploadFile(file);
// result.uri = 'ipfs://Qm...'
// result.gatewayUrl = 'https://gateway.thirdweb.com/ipfs/Qm...'
```

### Protected Routes
```tsx
<PrivyProtectedRoute>
  <Dashboard />
</PrivyProtectedRoute>
```

### Smart Wallet
```tsx
<SmartWalletProvider>
  {/* Users get gasless transactions */}
</SmartWalletProvider>
```

## Error Handling

Common errors:
- "Insufficient USDC" - User needs to add funds
- "Invalid wallet address" - Check address format (0x + 40 hex chars)
- "Network mismatch" - Switch to Varity L3 (Chain ID 33529)

## Documentation URLs
- Full docs: https://docs.varity.so
- SDK reference: https://docs.varity.so/packages/sdk/overview
- UI Kit reference: https://docs.varity.so/packages/ui-kit/overview
- CLI reference: https://docs.varity.so/cli/overview

- Twitter: https://x.com/VarityHQ
